label.name: no_untag_in_vlans
label.value: Set to no untagged in vlan(s)

label.name: no_untag_in_vlan
label.value: Set port(s) to no untagged in vlan

label.name: no_untag_success
label.value: Has been set to no untagged in vlan

label.name: no_untag_warning_message
label.value: Warning, a port must be either tagged or untagged in a vlan. It can't be no untagged in all vlans :

label.name: backup_warning
label.value: Warning : this cause some ping loss during tftp connection.

label.name: vlan_creation_message
label.value: has been successfully created on the following switches

label.name: vlan_creation_error_message
label.value: The Vlan hasn't been created on the following switches (see errors above)

label.name: deploy_vlan
label.value: Deploy this vlan on selected switches

label.name: delete_vlan_on_other_switches
label.value: Delete this/those vlan(s) on other switch(es)

label.name: vlan_deletion_message
label.value: has been successfully deleted on following switch(es)

label.name: switch_configuration_modification_warning
label.value:
The configuration file will be sent to the switch which will reboot.
Connect to the device with ssh and type show run to verify that the configuration is correct.
Then save eventually the modification with write memory command.

label.name: select_a_port
label.value: Click on a port to modify the configuration

message.name: MSG_WRONG_PARAMETERS
message.value: ERROR: Wrong parameter(s)

message.name: MSG_BAD_OS_TYPE
message.value: ERROR: Bad configutation (config.conf) : OS_TYPE

message.name: MSG_SNMP_NOT_INSTALLED_WINDOWS
message.value: ERROR: Please install snmp support for php (extension=php_snmp.dll in php.ini, php version >= 5.3.3).

message.name: MSG_SNMP_NOT_INSTALLED_UNIX
message.value:
ERROR: Please install snmp support for php ('apt-get install php5-snmp' and '/etc/init.d/apache2 restart' under debian and ubuntu).
If you're using a Windows server, change OS_TYPE to WINDOWS in config.conf file and install/enable php_snmp

message.name: MSG_MCRYPT_NOT_INSTALLED_WINDOWS
message.value:
","ERROR: Please install mcrypt support for php (extension=php_mcrypt.dll in php.ini, php version >= 5.3.3).
Mcrypt is used to encrypt backups of switches configuration files. If you don't need that functionnality, disable it by setting ENCRYPT_SAVED_CONFIGURATION_FILES=1 to 0.

message.name: MSG_MCRYPT_NOT_INSTALLED_UNIX
message.value:
ERROR: Please install snmp support for php ('apt-get install php5-mcrypt' and '/etc/init.d/apache2 restart' under debian and ubuntu).
If you're using a Windows server, change OS_TYPE to WINDOWS in config.conf file and install/enable mcrypt. Mcrypt is used to encrypt backups of switches.
If you don't need that functionality, disable it by setting ENCRYPT_SAVED_CONFIGURATION_FILES=1 to 0.

message.name: MSG_ERRORS_OCCURED
message.value: One or more errors has occurred :

message.name: MSG_ERRORS_ADVICE
message.value: if Snmp V1 or v2, check community (unrestricted access), else, check v3 authentication parameters.

message.name: MSG_VLAN_NAME_TOO_LONG
message.value: ERROR: Name too long !

message.name: MSG_VLAN_BAD_NAME
message.value: ERROR : The name must not be a number !

message.name: MSG_VLAN_ID_BAD_VALUE
message.value: ERROR: Vlan id must be an integer.

message.name: MSG_VLAN_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.value: ERROR: A vlan with the same name already exists on this device.

message.name: MSG_VLAN_ID_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.value: ERROR: A vlan with the same id already exists on this device.

message.name: MSG_NON_EXISTENT_VLAN
message.value: ERROR: This vlan does not exist.

message.name: MSG_VLAN_HAS_PORTS_TAGGED_OR_UNTAGGED
message.value: ERROR: This vlan has some tagged or untagged ports : cannot be deleted !

message.name: MSG_DEFAULT_VLAN_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.value: ERROR: VLAN with id 1 (default vlan) cannot be deleted.

message.name: MSG_ONLY_ONE_AUTHENTICATION_TYPE_ALLOWED
message.value: ERROR: You have activated the two kinds of authentication in config.conf file. Only one is allowed !

message.name: MSG_SUPPORT
message.value: To get some help,

message.name: MSG_SUPPORT_LINK
message.value: click here.

message.name: MSG_AT_LEAST_ONE_VLAN_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.value: ERROR: Please select at least one VLAN.

message.name: MSG_2_SWITCHES_WITH_THE_SAME_ID
message.value: ERROR: Two switches have the same ID in switches.xml

message.name: MSG_2_SWITCHES_WITH_THE_SAME_IP
message.value: ERROR: Two switches have the same IP address in switches.xml

message.name: MSG_2_OIDS_WITH_THE_SAME_ID
message.value: ERREUR : Two OIDs have the same ID in OIDs.xml

message.name: AD_ERROR_MESSAGE
message.value: Access denied !

message.name: JTA_CONFIGURATION_FILE_UNWRITABLE
message.value: Impossible to open in write mode jta configuration file. Check that jta/ folder is writeable for web server user (www-data generally).

message.name: ACCESS_DENIED
message.value: Acces denied !

message.name: MINDTERM_AND_JTA_BOTH_SELECTED
message.value: Error in config.conf. Please choose between mindterm and jta. You cannot select both !

message.name: SSH_CONNECTION_ERROR
message.value: Impossible to connect with ssh to the switch. Have you activated it on the switch (ip ssh command), have you set the good password ?

message.name: SSH_RECV_ERROR
message.value: Impossible to connect with ssh to the switch. Have you activated it on the switch (ip ssh command), have you set the good password ?

message.name: SSH_FOPEN_W_ERROR
message.value: Impossible to open configuration file for writing. Have you activated ssh filetransfer on the switch ? (conf t then ip ssh filetransfer and write memory)

message.name: SSH_FWRITE_ERROR
message.value: Impossible to send the configuration to the switch. Have you activated ssh filetransfer on the switch ? (conf t then ip ssh filetransfer and write memory)

message.name: CONFIGURATION_SAVED_OK
message.value: The configuration has been saved successfully.
